appsgate.lig.main.spec
Interface AppsGateSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:
Appsgate
public interface AppsGateSpec

AppsGate specification that define all method that a client can remote call to interact with the Appsgate system.

Since:
June 19, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cedric GÃ©rard
